==Distribution==
==Distribution==
â
Evolution 2.22 was released on [[2008-03-11]], together with GNOME 2.22 (March 2008). GNOME is the default desktop environment for several Linux distributions, most notably [[Debian]], [[Fedora (Linux distribution)|Fedora]] and [[Ubuntu]]. [[Foresight Linux]] showcases the latest releases of GNOME. Novell distributes Evolution with SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10.
+
Evolution 2.22 was released on [[2008-03-11]], together with GNOME 2.22 (March 2008). GNOME is the default desktop environment for several Linux distributions, most notably [[Debian]], [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]] and [[Ubuntu]]. [[Foresight Linux]] showcases the latest releases of GNOME. Novell distributes Evolution with SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10.
Evolution 2.22 is also available as [[source code]]. Some pre-built install packages are available for other operating systems, but only for older versions.
Evolution 2.22 is also available as [[source code]]. Some pre-built install packages are available for other operating systems, but only for older versions.
